summary: This is a forwarded email from August 10, 2019, sharing a news article link from the New York Post announcing the death of convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein. The email appears to be a personal communication forwarding the news.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the news article being forwarded; his death is announced.

persons.name: Ray
persons.context: The person who 'just saw this' news and is presumably forwarding the link via email.

events.title: Announcement of Jeffrey Epstein's Death
events.description: A news article from the New York Post reports that convicted pedophile Jeffrey Epstein is dead.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, forwarding a news link.
The forwarded news article announces the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
The source of the news is identified as the New York Post.
The email indicates the news was seen and shared promptly on the day it broke.
